Name: BlockSquare
XmlUI:
<Panel
		id = "panel1"
		active = "false"
        color="Grey"
		textColor = "White"
		position = "0 0 -2000"
		width = "200"
		height = "150"
		scale = "0.5 1 1"
		offsetXY = "-700 1500"
        allowDragging="true"
        returnToOriginalPositionWhenReleased="false"
        restrictDraggingToParentBounds="false"
>
	<Text
	text = "Drag"
	fontSize = "70"
	></Text>
	<Button
	onClick = "Apply"
	text = "Apply"
	fontSize = "70"
	color = "#1e81b0"
	offsetXY = "900 0"
	>
	</Button>
<VerticalScrollView
id = "scroll1"
rotation = "0 0 0"
position = "0 0 0"
 	height="3000"
 	width="2000"
	offsetXY = "0 -1600"

>
<InputField
 	text = "Enter text..." 
	lineType="MultiLineNewline"
 	height="60000"
 	width="4000"
 	textColor="#a4d9fa"
 	offsetXY = "0 0"
 	color="#1f1f1f"
	 fontSize = "50"
 	id="input1"
	onValueChanged = "typing"
	onEndEdit = "typing"
 />
</VerticalScrollView>
</Panel>
